function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interdependent infection channels at the population level","Impact":"Increased risk of widespread contagion and transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing population-level measures such as social distancing, travel restrictions, and mass testing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote work technologies, and surveillance systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Reversal of protective effects at the population level","Impact":"Risk of high social status and economic activity contributing to increased contagion in the initial phase of an epidemic","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions to address the specific risk factors associated with high social status and economic activity","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying at-risk populations, targeted communication strategies","People":"High-income individuals and economically active groups","Owner":"Public health authorities and community organizations"}]}
